Posts.Content: Jun 9, 2010 10:13AM hazian30 wrote: My onco also recommended AC x 4 and T x 12.  I will have my 4th AC on the 15th of this month and then will start Taxol 2 weeks after that.  The SE's with the AC for me are awful.. I am 31 years old with 2 younger children and I do not have the energy to do what I need to do.. It is different for everyone, but if I had the option of taking something with fewer side effects but the same results I would take it.  However, a third opinion doesn't sound so bad.  Best of luck to you.
Posts.Title: AC vs TC? what do u think? cheyenna Claire_in_Seattle
